email_chain.subject: Offer for Steel Coils Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN STAR available for your steel coils shipment from Shanghai to Los Angeles. Vessel details: DWT 150,000, LOA 250m. Freight rate is $85/MT CIF. Laycan 15-20 November. Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Steel Coils Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thanks for the offer. The rate seems a bit high. Can you do $75/MT? Also, can you confirm the loading window and demurrage rate?

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Steel Coils Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Apologies for the typo in the subject. Loading window is 72 hours, demurrage $15,000/day. Best I can do is $78/MT. Let me know.

Best,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Steel Coils Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thanks for the update. Let's proceed. Please send the recap.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Recap - Steel Coils Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Please find recap below:
- Commodity: Steel Coils
- Cargo Size: 25,000MT
- Load Port: Shanghai
- Disch Port: Los Angeles
- Freight Rate: USD 78/MT CIF
- Laycan: 15-20 November
- Demurrage: $15,000/day

Let me know if any corrections needed.

Best,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Correction: Recap - Steel Coils Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Apologies, I noticed a typo in the laycan. Correct laycan is 16-21 November. Please update your records.

Best,
Laura
